website_summaries.verdict: From supplementing kitten food to adding protein and calories to a kitten's diet, this high-calorie formula is a good choice.
pros: Rich gel is packed with protein and can be given on top of food
A good option for supplementing a regular diet for kittens that have been sickly or need to gain weight
Can be given to cats, dogs, and puppies, too
cons: Thick consistency can be a bit messy
Some kittens weren't interested in eating it

customer_reviews.title: Give this to sickly pups and kittens to get them through a tough time
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. If I have a pup that has aspirated and is not wanting to nurse for a day or two I put some of this on my finger and wipe it across the roof of their mouth every few hours. This stuff gives them a little nourishment, energy, and increases their desire to eat. It probably also gives them a little moisture, but not enough, so I give them a little water in syringe from time to time. This is also good to use as a supplement to the feeding of a pup that is just falling behind the others a little.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri - Family Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cats declined any of this product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect any issue with this but 3 of 3 cats won't touch it despite multiple attempts They don't usually do that to anything edible. Requested a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mndee

customer_reviews.title: Supplement Not Palatable to All Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 month old Rescue puppy who is underweight. She seems to like the taste but was only willing to eat eat after I dabbed her on her lips. I don’t think she likes the smell. Neither does my 12 year old, who is eating but losing weight. She didn’t seem to like the taste or smell. I think it will work. If I need another tube, I may try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cat
customer_reviews.text: When my cat had a severe respiratory infection, she refused to eat because could not smell her food. I had to rub a tiny amount at a time onto her gums to keep her eating something. It's kind of sticky, but this gel (with IV fluids from the vet) kept her alive until she could smell again. I keep a new tube on hand for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This supplement was very helpful for my little dog that simply refused to eat her food. I'd give her some of this gel by putting it on my finger and at least this product was able to get some sustenance into her, and she seemed to like it and look forward to getting it. I believe it also stimulated her appetite so that she became willing to start eating small meals again. A good go-to if your pup isnt getting enough nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: rosalyn

customer_reviews.title: Not enough for a BIG dog but got him to eat.
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80lb rescue foster that needs to get to 100lbs. This product did not put weight on him but it DID encourage him to eat more. Way more. I would just put a heaping glob of it on anything I wanted him to eat (kibble, chicken, rice) and he would scarf it down. Its has a sticky texture, so I put it on my finger and stuck it in his gums to get him to start licking and eating.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMonroe

customer_reviews.title: Cats refused to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for one of my cat who is a picky eater and it is hard to get him to eat. I am not surprised he wouldn't eat it because he is picky about most food. He sniffed the tube and backed off immediately like he smelled something horrible. I gave it to my other cat, as a test, who loves everything, and he had the same reaction. However, the gel is in a thick form that I can put it on my finger, grab my cat, put it in my cat's mouth and he licks it off of my finger. That is the only way to get him to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly.R

customer_reviews.title: Forget nutrical!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional dog person, going through dozens of high calorie tubes a year, and let me tell you guys - this is the holy grail of them all. It's actually palatable. Dogs actually love it, while trying to stuff them with alternatives is akin to trying to feed a stone Buddha. It also beads up nicely on your finger and doesn't smear molasses colored goo all over your house like all the other similar products. Please never stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeplessdomore

customer_reviews.title: Helps cats keep food down. Cat gets nourishment and I’m not cleaning up cat vomit.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I have an older cat who has always been a picky eater and has always had a sensitive stomach. Switching to different cat foods has helped but finally she was throwing up everything-even the limited ingredients Blue Buffalo Basics. Started using this product about 4 days ago and it has made a huge difference; she can handle both Science Diet and Iams again without throwing up. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sharonm

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool and soon a video will prove .
customer_reviews.text: My dad’s puppy does bite (Pink Panther, Peter Sellers)but with Enercal high Calorie Nutritional Supplement, it’s to puppies what cat-nip is to gatos. Videos to follow of Romeo becoming a dog and a gentleman ( he will never qualify to be on officer , but his coat is white!)
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rosacker

customer_reviews.title: Both Cats and Dogs Like It
customer_reviews.text: This is a concentrated gel for providing supplemental noutrition to cats and dogs. You use very little. One teaspoon is all I give to my cat and toy breed dog. They eat it readily from my fingertip. They seem to really like the taste. It's easy and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: an honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently delicious, according to my dogs enthusiastic wiggles.
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to think it's delicious. Repeat customer. It is thick, and in a plastic tube. I can't get the last little bit out, so I feel a little wasteful. But that's just me. Highly recommend. My fur baby has pancreatitis, and this doesn't upset his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Unappetizing
customer_reviews.text: It sounds like this worked for some people, but my cat HATED it. I couldn’t get him to eat anything it was put on or mixed in with.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this supplement for my sick cat. Its full of all the nutrients she needed. It's very easy to use since pills are difficult. I would recommend this for a pet that's not eating enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for sensitive appetite doggies. I used this for my teacup chihuahua and it always gave him that uplifting he needed when he was down. Love this product and it is a great value on Amazon.com, I paid $25.00 for the same bottle at a vet office.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: As A Last Resort
customer_reviews.text: My older dog was diagnosed with cancer. After about 8 months is spread to his liver and he suddenly wouldn't eat. I finally had to let hi go a few weeks ago. He did eat some of this and I like to think it helped him?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Finickitty
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loved it at first when we opened it and then after a couple days we had to almost force feed her by putting some at the top of her mouth with a finger. Not sure what happened. Flavor must be pretty good but I'm not sure why she changed her mind after a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Rkibler

customer_reviews.title: Not as much as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's 5oz but the shipping weight is 3.2oz? That's makes no sense and it showed because I didn't get as many doses as I expected. Administering this to a sick cat is quite the struggle. Very difficult to get out of fur. My cat survived thanks to this though. I wish it had taurine in it.
customer_reviews.author: Emersyn Kayle

customer_reviews.title: Cat refuses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my older cat that is losing weight even though he has a good appetite. My cat refused to even consider eating it after he sniffed it. I tried to see if my other cat would try it and he refused it also
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to help maintain weight for an 18yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to help maintain weight for an 18yr old cat dealing with kidney disease. Found it to be more effective than other, similar products that were available locally and at a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Partially pooch approved
customer_reviews.text: My old dog didn’t like this nearly as well as the more expensive green tube or bottled competitor. Sometimes he refused to eat it. But it’s less costly for good ingredients so I recommend if your pooch approves.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love irresistable taste!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has had trouble gaining weight. My vet recommend a gel supplement & this one works great!
customer_reviews.author: JULIANA M. CROSON

customer_reviews.title: Poop tastes better than this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my cats who is losing weight. She refuses to touch anything it has come into contact with. My dogs, who will eat ANYTHING (their favorite treat is poop of any species, particularly human or cat) will not touch this stuff either. I don't know what it tastes like, but apparently it's not as yummy as poop is. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too viscous
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not lick this out of the tube. I purchased this as a replacement for Dr Richards organic calorie paste but my cat does not like it, and it is much harder to administer since it is so viscous.
customer_reviews.author: laura megan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what I bought. This enercal looks darker.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks much darker than the product I buy at the vets office. I don’t j or if it’s the real product. My dog doesn’t love this like the old product I had given him prior.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have found this to be a staple at my house. It saved my dog's life when she was recovering from an infection in her throat. Now I use it regularly to put weight on my little three pound Maltese.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for maintaining weight in a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our dog with cancer who doesn’t eat well. I manage to maintain his weight by adding this to his diet daily. He likes the flavor which is something as he is very very picky right now.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. MccAin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pregnant and lactating pets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation for a litter of Yorkies. However, momma dog ended up consuming the entire tube, adding some much needed calories to her diet.
customer_reviews.author: MommyinHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.text: Our dog didn't really LOVE this enough to help. Our vet said our dog would have to eat a tube of this every day to really help her get enough calories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but my yorkies got bored
customer_reviews.text: ok I have 2 yorkies and they are a little difficult when is eating time, this has help them like the first couple of weeks but now they hesitate eating it again so maybe they got bored.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my cats paw & he licks it off. And when I put it on my own finger, he licks it off my finger! He likes it! I notice he eats more of his own food when I give him this supplement, so it does increase his appetite
customer_reviews.author: Nietzsche Infidel

customer_reviews.title: Flip top makes for nice and easy dispensing.
customer_reviews.text: Dog did not like, preferred Tomlyn, which is cheaper. The only way to put some on my finger for her to lick off was to moisten my finger, otherwise it made for a gooey mess. Do NOT get this on your dogs face or fur, they will need a haircut! Pop open top was lovely, and made dispensing easier.
customer_reviews.author: T Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog has not been eating at all. But he seemed to like this. But he did not gain weight, in fact it gave him the Diareah
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my anemic cat. Easy to use, just put it on the roof of her mouth. She doesn't like our but doesn't fight, so it can't taste that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: This product works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loss her appetite for a week and loss weight due to her sister dog was adopted. After I gave her this 3 times a week. She began eating and gaining get weight back! This product by works!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Perfect Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boost of energy
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our English Springer Spaniel during hunting trips. He tends to run hard and is often too excited to eat when we are loading up. This gives him a boost in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Allyn-Page

customer_reviews.title: Good for old cat
customer_reviews.text: Used for 18 year old cat. Helps her get extra calories, I mix it in her broth. She does not eat solid foods. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: MRF

customer_reviews.title: nope, dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: I wish this would have worked for my dog, but he is very picky and the consistency of this product bothered him. He always been a picky eater, so this was just not going to work. It feels like really thick sticky molasses and even smells like it. He was not interested at all. I took it to my vet and he wasnt impressed either. Hopefully it works for others, but did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kdmt1970

customer_reviews.title: Tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Help.my dog hang in there after he lost his appetite. He finally recovered and gained it back. He loved the taste!!
customer_reviews.author: Anahull

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick Past
customer_reviews.text: This was to thick for me to use well. I had to warm it to thin. Does not mix well with food. Might be good if your cat just licks it.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Pets

customer_reviews.title: She refused to eat anything but would lick the product from the tube like a popsicle
customer_reviews.text: I used this as well as the nutritional paste during my dogs 12+ hour whelping. She refused to eat anything but would lick the product from the tube like a popsicle. I will use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra  Sterns

customer_reviews.title: Great for sick or finicky dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It helped my dog when he was sick and would not eat!It stimulates their appetite and gives them nutrients!!Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Clean Out of Carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to help supplement our older cat's diet after he lost weight. He would not eat it and flung it off his paw all over the house. This is very difficult to remove from carpet! We gave up after a couple attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smiff

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended nutrition supplement
customer_reviews.text: It is very sticky like molasses therefore it can be messy. Enercal is amazing for weight gain in older dogs as well as for nursing dogs that lose calories from feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Lirpa Harper

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended by friend to use on finger with pill for dog. It worked for a few weeks. good idea. like that it has nutritional value too. He's on to it now so will revisit in a month or two. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: jbfl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Best weight gainer! I've tried others and they gave my puppy diarrhea. She's actually putting on weight finally.
customer_reviews.author: Micci

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like this so mach-easy to use,
customer_reviews.text: Dogs so liked this product- we give pregnant and lactating female and little puppy- every one like it- it’s so important for small breed- good test.

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: The cat I purchased it for did not like the flavor and refused to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: KerryLynn

customer_reviews.title: recommended by my vet for a malnourished abandoned kitten
customer_reviews.text: recommended by my vet for a malnourished abandoned kitten. it worked great to get her appetite and help boost her back to health.
customer_reviews.author: EUNICE

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves it. It's a great way to get him the nutrients he badly needs. He licks this up happily right out of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Delaney

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't like it, but it could be just him.
customer_reviews.text: My dog, for whatever reason, does not like this. He's very picky however and only wants to eat chicken which is why I bought in the first place. We rescued him from a puppy mill so I've no idea why a dog in that situation would be so particular about food. If I heat up the chicken and mix it in so he can't taste it that works. It's a good idea but in my situation it's not really effective.
customer_reviews.author: greengirl

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional Gel
customer_reviews.text: Too thick - my big dogs didn’t particularly like the taste but I did put on some bread and they ate it. I put on their kibble and turned their noses up at it. Good value for your money if dogs likes it. Haven’t tried with my cat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Dogs

customer_reviews.title: How to administrated
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product for your dog , my dog even if he has vomiting he ate this cream which is good because he can get an hypoglycemic status which is dangerous because the dog can died

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, my shihtzu loves it
customer_reviews.text: No mess, finger measurements as told by vet. My puppy waits for it wagging her tail.

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients..  But that's all
customer_reviews.text: Tough to give to your dog. Non of the dog IV ever had would eat this gel / paste. Very tough for my dog to eat it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement for Cat
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin supplement for our cat and he loves the taste.

customer_reviews.title: Packed with sugars
customer_reviews.text: This will provide calories, but be aware that the top ingredients are malt syrup and corn syrup. Not a particularly healthy nutritional supplement.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs liked it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog passed away before we received it. I fed it to my other healthy dogs. They liked it. My other dog had suffered a stroke and had cancer and could not swallow so we were looking for something I could feed her from a spoon.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: My cat found this disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn't like this at all! I put some on her nose and she wiped her nose on my carpet to get it off. It has a very sticky, nasty texture and I can't believe any cats like this.

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My furbaby hasn't much an appetite, and this is a great supplement, actually it gives him an appetite after I give it to him A+ rating!

customer_reviews.title: calories for aging cat
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging cat that developed a sensitive stomach and had lost weight. I needed something that could help her stop loosing weight or at least supplement what she did eat. After reading many reviews on this product- cat either loved it or HATED it- I decided to give it a try and hope for the best. Though she didn't turn her nose up at it, she didn't go crazy for it either. So, I would take about pea sized amounts and roll it in bonito (tuna) flakes. Now she begs me for it every morning. I'm thrilled because this hasn't upset her stomach and I can get some much needed calories in her. I
customer_reviews.author: L Small

customer_reviews.title: ... an older Flame Point Siamese who is a very good eater. NOT this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We have an older Flame Point Siamese who is a very good eater. NOT this stuff, he hates it. Despises it! drat.
customer_reviews.author: F. Morris Rosman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work and my dogs love the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Hudson

product_meta.title: Enercal High Calorie Nutritional Supplement Gel (5 oz)
product_meta.description:
EnerCal is a vitamin and mineral supplement for dogs and cats. EnerCal also acts as an added source of energy. Pets love its highly palatable flavor. To acquaint your pet to the flavor of EnerCal, place a small amount on your pet’s nose or paw. 

Key Features:
High-protein nutritional supplement for cats and dogs
Highly palatable
5 oz tube
